sentences.sContent: a treacherous plot to overthrow the leader
sentences.sCn: 一个推翻领导人的阴谋

synos.tran: 奸诈的，叛逆的，背叛的；危险的；不牢靠的

words.tran: 背叛地；危险地；靠不住地

trans.tranCn: 奸诈的，叛逆的，背叛的；危险的；不牢靠的
trans.tranOther: someone who is treacherous cannot be trusted because they are not loyal and secretly intend to harm you
